name: Samsung Messages Backup
short_description:
As a famous electronic manufacturer, Samsung cell phones has become one of the most popular smart phones on the market. Coolmuster Android Assistant works well as a professional Samsung Messages Backup, which is a life saver for people who want to save some precious text messages out of mobile phones forever. With it, you can:
- One-click to backup all memorable messages on your Windows or Mac computer for reviewing later.
- Works well as a mass texting software, you can use it to send same messages to your friends at one time.
- Save the exported Samsung text messages as .xlm or .txt file on the computer.
- Perfectly manage your phone calls on Windows and Mac computer.
